fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Bloodthirsty: Whenever you Kill a player, draw 2 (Satcheled) cards. 
- Enraged: When in a Duel, immediately draw 2 cards.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rest: Play a Heal! on yourself. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Intimidate: Gain a Trap?! or a Confound?! [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Bloodthirsty: Lose 1 HP to gain a random attacking card OR lose 2 HP to gain a non Special card of your choice. [Infinite uses, 1 CD] 
- Pummel: Pick a player. Deal 2 HP Unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase. Cannot be the same player targeted by the Chaos Night attack. Gains a use every 3 players you Kill. [1 use, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
